extendedInfo.description: Use earbuds or plug your Droid into your amp to practice along with these drum patterns. This program is for any musicians like Guitar, Bass and Keyboard players who want to practice their music along with the drums or metronome. This drum and metronome based program is simple to operate  with everything on one screen. - Scroll the list and touch an item to play it. - Touch the stop button to stop. - Use the volume slider to change volume. The program includes various fully rendered (not midi) patterns:- Rock drum pattern in 4 tempos- Blues drum pattern in 5 tempos- 3 Metal  drum patterns in a total of  5 tempos- Lead Rock drum pattern (for practicing solos) in 3 tempos- Metronome  pattern in 5 temposFuture updates to the program will include more patterns.- One Country pattern- One Train pattern (you'll know it when you hear it)- One Reggae pattern

reviews.title: How great is this for teaching !
reviews.comment: I run  free music teaching groups.....I have finally found a great drum app for fun rhythum sessions. would be happy to pay for upgrade but cant find one.     Well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gotta be honest...
reviews.comment: This app is not good. If you create an app for the sole purpose of loopng beats for rehearsal you gotta care enough to make it right. Whoever said they are an instructor an love this app should refund their students because their recommendations for instructive tools sucks. The uset who wrote about this app dropping beats is mostly right ... What they are wrong about is that nearly every loop drops at least an eighth to sixteenth in 4/4 time. Could be a great app due to having a better variety of beats here
reviews.author: Dr. Matt

reviews.title: Simply drums
reviews.comment: Good set of beats and tempos for practice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice...
reviews.comment: As far as Drums Patters to play along with go, this App is BY FAR the best. It\'s still not perfect, but better than anything else out there right now... I wish they\'d improve upon it. Make it bigger & better... But hey, its free!
reviews.author: TheMighty Bruski

reviews.title: Some Patterns Hesitate
reviews.comment: Xoom 3.2, app is 2.03.   Some patterns hesitate after the measure\'s last beat going into the next measure\'s 1st beat : rock_105, rock_120, leadrock_105, leadrock_135, blues_120, blues_145, metro_095 (very, very small delay), now for something weird -- sometimes metro_100 has a delay and other times metro_105 has the delay.    Can\'t chg time signature...can only select bpm from list, which is adequate. Simple, basic -- very good for beginners, and even useful for veterans when you just need a quick reminder.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Full control over tempo could make a huge difference. 5 star\'s waiting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s simple and it works ok.

reviews.comment: Nice app, easy to use, and the sounds are pretty good,

reviews.title: Loops Inaccurate
reviews.comment: rhythm is supposed to be continuous and flowing... these loops are not. you\'ll see.
reviews.author: A Google User
